sentence: Recent studies have provided consistent evidence that treatment with abatacept results in a rapid onset of efficacy that is maintained over the course of treatment in patients with inadequate response to @CHEMICAL$ and anti-@GENE$ therapies.
label: false

sentence: @CHEMICAL$ inhibitors currently under investigation include the small molecules @GENE$ (Iressa, ZD1839) and erlotinib (Tarceva, OSI-774), as well as monoclonal antibodies such as cetuximab (IMC-225, Erbitux).
label: CPR:4

sentence: @CHEMICAL$ inhibitors currently under investigation include the small molecules gefitinib (@GENE$, ZD1839) and erlotinib (Tarceva, OSI-774), as well as monoclonal antibodies such as cetuximab (IMC-225, Erbitux).
label: CPR:4
